block.p: SCHWARTZ-Frieda, at 85 years. Beloved wife of Moses. Devoted mother of Ira and Barbara. Cherished grandmother of Samantha and Diana. Adored aunt of Ruth, Michael, Susan and Jonathan. Service today, 10AM, ''Parkside'' Memorial Chapels, 2576 Flatbush Ave, Bklyn, NY (near Avenue V).

SCHWARZ-Irene Eva. Cherished wife of the late Gerald B. Beloved mother of Richard M. Estes (Pamela Graine). Devoted grandmother of Kenneth M., William J. and Jessica J. Services 1 PM, Tuesday, June 13th, Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave.

SCHWARTZ-Frieda, at 85 years. Beloved wife of Moses. Devoted mother of Ira and Barbara. Cherished grandmother of Samantha and Diana. Adored aunt of Ruth, Michael, Susan and Jonathan. Service today, 10AM, ''Parkside'' Memorial Chapels, 2576 Flatbush Ave, Bklyn, NY (near Avenue V).

SCHWARZ-Irene Eva. Cherished wife of the late Gerald B. Beloved mother of Richard M. Estes (Pamela Graine). Devoted grandmother of Kenneth M., William J. and Jessica J. Services 1 PM, Tuesday, June 13th, Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave.
